node package¶

Submodules¶

node.node module¶

class node.node.node(data, link)[source]¶

Bases: object

The node class holds a collection of characters using nodes. It includes methods that allow the nodes to be manipulated and modified.

__init__(data, link)[source]¶

Constructs a node using specified data value and link.

Variables:

  • __data – data value for node

  • __link – link for node

Args:

data (str): specified data value link (node): specified link

getData()[source]¶

Returns the data value stored in the calling node.

Returns:

str: data value stored in the calling node

setData(data)[source]¶

Sets the data value stored in the calling node to the specified data value.

Args:

data (str): specified data value

getLink()[source]¶

Returns the link stored in the calling node.

Returns:

node: link stored in the calling node

setLink(link)[source]¶

Sets the link stored in the calling node to the specified link.

Args:

link (node): specified link

addNodeAfter(element)[source]¶

Adds a new node containing a specified element value at a selected position in the calling node.

Args:

element (str): specified element value

removeNodeAfter()[source]¶

Removes a node from a selected position in the calling node.

static listLength(head)[source]¶

Computes the number of nodes in a specified node.

Args:

head (node): specified node

Returns:

int: number of nodes

static listSearch(head, target)[source]¶

Searches for a specified target value in a specified node.

Args:

head (node): specified node target (str): specified target value

Returns:

node: reference to node that contains specified target value if specified target value is found, else None

static listPosition(head, position: int)[source]¶

Searches for a node in a specified node based on a specified posotion.

Args:

head (node): specified node position (int): specified posotion

Raises:

ValueError: indicates position is less than or equal to zero

Returns:

node: reference to node at specified position if specified position is found, else null

static listCopy(source)[source]¶

Makes a copy of a specified node.

Args:

source (node): specified node

Returns:

node: reference to head of copy

static listCopyWithTail(source)[source]¶

Makes a copy of a specified node.

Args:

source (node): specified node

Returns:

[node]: reference to head and tail of copy

static listPart(start, end)[source]¶

Makes a copy of node starting at a specified node and ending at a specified node.

Args:

start (node): specified starting node end (node): specified ending node

Raises:

ValueError: indicates start in None ValueError: indicates end in None ValueError: indicates end not found in start

Returns:

[node]: reference to head and tail of copy

__str__()[source]¶

Return str(self).
